actionCalls.name: myRule_6_A2
actionCalls.label: Create task to review ID docs

actionCalls.name: myRule_8_A2
actionCalls.label: Create task - MLRO to review AML

rules.name: myRule_10
rules.label: MRLO review of Identity Documents= Approved

value.stringValue: OR( AND( ISPICKVAL([AML__c].Experian__c,"Pass"), ISPICKVAL([AML__c].WC1__c,"Pass") ), AND( ISPICKVAL([AML__c].Experian__c,"Pass"), ISPICKVAL([AML__c].WC1__c,"Pass following review") ), AND( ISPICKVAL([AML__c].Experian__c,"Pass"), ISPICKVAL([AML__c].MRLO_Review_of_Identity_Documents__c,"Approved") ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_1
formulas.expression: OR( AND( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Experian__c},"Pass"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.WC1__c},"Pass") ), AND( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Experian__c},"Pass"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.WC1__c},"Pass following review") ), AND( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Experian__c},"Pass"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.MRLO_Review_of_Identity_Documents__c},"Approved") ) )

value.stringValue: OR( AND( ISPICKVAL([AML__c].MRLO_Review_of_Identity_Documents__c,"Rejected"), ISPICKVAL([AML__c].WC1__c,"Pass") ), AND( ISPICKVAL([AML__c].MRLO_Review_of_Identity_Documents__c,"Rejected"), ISPICKVAL([AML__c].WC1__c,"Pass following review") ), AND( ISPICKVAL([AML__c].MRLO_Review_of_Identity_Documents__c,"Rejected"), ISPICKVAL([AML__c].WC1__c,"Fail") ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_12
formulas.expression: OR( AND( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.MRLO_Review_of_Identity_Documents__c},"Rejected"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.WC1__c},"Pass") ), AND( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.MRLO_Review_of_Identity_Documents__c},"Rejected"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.WC1__c},"Pass following review") ), AND( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.MRLO_Review_of_Identity_Documents__c},"Rejected"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.WC1__c},"Fail") ) )

value.stringValue: OR( AND( ISPICKVAL([AML__c].Experian__c,"Pass"), ISPICKVAL([AML__c].WC1__c,"Pass") ), AND( ISPICKVAL([AML__c].Experian__c,"Pass"), ISPICKVAL([AML__c].WC1__c,"Pass following review") ), AND( ISPICKVAL([AML__c].Experian__c,"Pass"), ISPICKVAL([AML__c].MRLO_Review_of_Identity_Documents__c,"Approved") ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_1_pmetrule
formulas.expression: OR( AND( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_old.Experian__c},"Pass"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_old.WC1__c},"Pass") ), AND( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_old.Experian__c},"Pass"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_old.WC1__c},"Pass following review") ), AND( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_old.Experian__c},"Pass"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_old.MRLO_Review_of_Identity_Documents__c},"Approved") ) )
